snippet: Paul Pierce, who led the Celtics with 23 points, and LeBron James, who led the Heat with 29 points, both fouled out in overtime as the Celtics won to tie the series at 2-2.
abstract: Boston Celtics defeat Miami Heat, 93-91, in overtime to tie the Eastern Conference finals, 2-2.
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce, who led the Celtics with 23 points, and LeBron James, who led the Heat with 29 points, both fouled out in overtime as the Celtics won to tie the series at 2-2.

headline.print_headline: Celtics Win on Scoreboard, but Grumbling Is a Tie
headline.seo: Celtics Prevail in Overtime and Tie the Series
headline.main: Celtics Even Series as James Takes a Seat
headline.content_kicker: Eastern Conference Finals Game 4: Celtics 93, Heat 91
